why do my coworkers laugh at me hi to anyone reading i dont know what to search to find an answer but im super self conscious in public and have social anxiety and this has been bothering me for a while i m 22f and i work in a care home doing nightshift when i first started work for the first few days i had to work dayshift very awkward and useless just watching people working the whole day i barely remember any interactions with anyone i remember being polite and try to make small talk mostly just wait until they talk first lol then i got moved to nightshift after a week everything was okay i was doing little assistant sort of tasks until one morning somebody asked me to see to a resident i sort of blue screened until i eventually said okay and went to the resident she was very sleepy and floppy to sit up onto the bed i started changing her until my back hurt so much from holding her up comfortably so i placed her down and asked for help it s already like 6 minutes past shift change so dayshift is there 3 people rushed into her room and looked shocked i saw their faces and i instantly started crying and panicking having sort of skipped breathing hicks i got reassured everything is okay and that they phrased it wrong saying to just scan her qr code on her door as a check like other residents i must have forgot to check her earlier the problem was she s a double and it was a risk for me and the resident to get ready and was almost impossible to change in the morning they said they were impressed that i actually got her almost ready in bed but i didn t care i only cared about the resident and i was never told she was a double many people are singles on that floor so being me i did whatever they asked me to without question as i worry i ll sound stupid if i ask them which is silly but it s better to be prepared for high risk patient care knowledge then myself looking stupid all of the day shift saw me crying and hyperventilating and panicking as i was worried i hurt her i didn t but they were saying everything okay and to go home and rubbing my back and holding my hand i felt like a child i felt stupid i felt insecure and useless this is why i think dayshift laugh at me when they see me now it s been 3 months and i know better one morning last week i was signing a paper and 2 dayshift girls behind me said cmon wait for jess to sign it and laughed at the time i didn t think much until i got home why did they say that i was only 5 seconds weird and yesterday don t know if it was the same girls but i squeezed past them to empty a cup into the sink before i left she didn t notice me and stepped backwards and bumped into my arm i was the one to say sorry i don t know why but she turned to her friend and started laughing why i just don t get it i gave them a questioning look as they turned their backs to me i struggle alot with crying i cry very easily i use to be a very angry kid until the anger switched to crying instead as i grew up i just want to know why people act like this i was going through alot during my first shifts and i feel like an idiot and treated like a child by the seniors because i can easily cry they ve only seen me cry that one time and nightshift one time when a resident was physically abusing me which was an understandable reason lol but when i cry it s not from sadness it s from frustration confusion guilt and anger but i think they think i m unstable and need babying i m tired of the just ignore them when they laugh at you don t waste time thinking about it i need answers

anyone else great socially but an anxious mess when they re alone i wanted to see if anyone here experiences something similar to me i haven t used this sub reddit before so i m not sure how common this is i can socialize just fine i hold conversations mess around even act like the joker in my friend group most people wouldn t guess i struggle at all but the moment i m alone my anxiety hits hard and i ruminate my brain flashes intrusive thoughts overthinking events or interactions for years afterward and i get physical tension like a tight chest sweating or even small tics like blinking hard or pinching myself i feel like i always have to scroll on my phone before going to bed to keep distracted or negative thoughts will keep playing in my mind small things can trigger it i get the usual why did i say that or why would i wear that outfit but i feel it s particularly strong when it comes to not being able to control how im perceived for e g i started a secret tiktok to finally express myself without feeling overwhelming shame one friend found it and mentioned it during a call and even thought i know its not that serious i immediately started sweating chest tight almost in tears and had to act like it didn t bother me after the call i started deleting videos because i didnt want my friends to see that side of me despite having other followers on that account even after calming myself down i couldnt relax knowing that side of me has been seen since then every time i m alone i replay that idea the i ve been exposed endlessly i ve been told in the past by people around me that it s okay to open up and i know logically the people around me would be supportive but i still feel extreme discomfort i ve always struggled to open up and even when i share something small like a hobby or plan i regret it afterward once i m home but what has me confused is that the next day i m fine socially again joking chatting and making a fool of myself yet it starts over again as soon as i m alone for other reasons i am quite sure i have adhd which i think has helped me at getting distracted but desperate to open up but my anxiety makes me overthink the interaction once i m not distracted anymore i m used to seeing the version where people get anxious building up courage to or just being around others i used to have this version only experiencing it delayed once i get home is what i find strange does anyone else experience this type of anxiety where you function great socially but struggle internally especially when alone or thinking about how you re perceived how do you cope tl dr: i act great socially but overthink and get anxious when alone replaying interactions feeling physical tension and obsessing over how i m perceived only to repeat again the next day anyone else relate

my feeling of loneliness is no longer temporary it s gone beyond that it s become a routine at some point being alone stopped feeling temporary it just became my normal there were no messages to reply to no plans to cancel no one really checking in my days started blending into each other wake up do what i need to do kill time somehow sleep and do it all again not because i wanted to be alone but because trying to connect felt exhausting and risky what s strange is how easy it is to get used to it you don t walk around thinking i m lonely you just stop expecting connection you move through the day quietly loneliness slowly turns into routine the hardest part wasn t the silence itself it was the feeling that i was fading out of people s lives like i could disappear and no one would really notice most days i m still alone that part hasn t suddenly changed but i ve stopped telling myself this is just who i am or that it means there s something wrong with me it s not a personality trait it s something that built up over time if your life feels quiet in a way that hurts you re not broken and you re not the only one living like this even if it feels that way sometimes the first step out of isolation isn t suddenly making friends it s realizing that loneliness became your default and admitting that you want something else

for a long time i thought i was scared of people but i realized something i m not afraid of talking i m afraid of starting once i say the first word my body slowly calms down what helped me wasn t forcing confidence it was making the first word smaller not a full sentence not a smart comment just yeah or okay or a small nod with one word i stopped waiting to feel ready and started letting my body warm up after i speak the fear doesn t disappear but it loosens if you struggle to talk try not to say more try to say less just enough to enter the moment

social anxiety but only with roommates having some roommate related frustrations and when i google my issues i keep ending up here as opposed to somewhere like a roommates subreddit wondering if i should take it as a sign for context: i struggle to leave my room when i think my roommates might be out and about in the shared space i skip meals sometimes because of this i feel hypervigilant unable to have my headphones in when they re chatting because i m eavesdropping in fear that they re saying something about me i worry about how my daily habits come off to them e g if i seem lazy or unsocial and i will go out of my way to act normal like pretending to leave to hang with friends when i m really just going out by myself the past three evenings i ve all spent in the city alone because i didn t want to be home i didn t want to seem like a shut in and if i left the house i could have dinner outside instead of cooking or eating dinner with my roommates whereas if i lived alone i would feel no guilt spending those evenings staying in is this a common roommate struggle or a sign of social anxiety i don t think i struggle significantly with social anxiety in other scenarios i guess sometimes but not to a debilitating or continuously frustrating degree i have depression but i always thought i only had a normal amount of anxiety so i never considered something like an anxiety disorder but should i be concerned

wtf is this point of talking when you get cut off and can t get your point across i m sick tired of it what s the point if talking if people cut you off and then put worlds in your mouth like let me fucking talk if you ask someone a question and then cut them off mid sentence you re fucked up unless this is an anxiety thing where you have to get a thought out before you forget or something then that s fine sick of feeling rushed when talking too let me fucking talk let me talk or leave me alone

i miss my old self the one who used to act naturally when meeting people one of the hardest things about social anxiety for me isn t even the fear it s feeling like i m not the same person i used to be sometimes i look back at old videos or messages and i barely recognize myself i used to talk easily joke without thinking just exist around people without overanalyzing everything now it feels like that version of me disappeared conversations don t flow anymore i pause too much overthink every word or say things that feel stiff and unnatural it s not that i don t have thoughts or things to say they just don t come out the way they used to for a long time i kept trying to force myself back into who i was before i pushed myself to be louder more social more normal all it did was make me feel worse like i was constantly failing at being myself what helped at least a little was realizing that i m just not that version of me right now and that doesn t mean i m broken it means something shifted and my body and mind are still adjusting i stopped chasing how i used to be and let conversations be slower and quieter i stopped expecting myself to sound confident or interesting all the time i stopped comparing every interaction to the past i don t feel natural again not really but i also don t feel like i m pretending all the time and honestly that feels like progress if you ever feel like you lost yourself socially you re not alone sometimes it s not about going back to who you were it s about slowly learning how to live as who you are now

is my communication style why my 5 year friendship is falling apart hi for some time i have been struggling with stress caused by a change in the style of my relationship with a friend i have known for 5 years this is a truly important relationship for me we met on roblox it was never a very close relationship we didn t write every day but we wrote every now and then whenever we wrote we had a lot of things to talk about our conversations could last for hours we always trusted each other and wrote literally about everything i would like to write like we used to again but i don t know what to do however for about half a year i feel that something has changed whenever i write the replies are kind of dry my friend doesn t write about herself as much anymore before literally from a conversation about how to cut carrots we could take it in any direction now when i write about studies life music i get a few short replies like aha okay mhm sometimes admittedly she tells me something about herself but she doesn t try to continue the conversation my anxiety got worse since i added her on ig and i see that she doesn t read messages so quickly or she reads them and doesn t reply to them i wouldn t have a problem with this if i didn t see that she is online on tiktok or ig and reposts different things so she clearly has time to at least reply i can t remember if this happened because of some behavior of mine or if it s just automatic i only know that once we argued because she forgot about a game with me and i was really angry about it but it seems to me that our conversation was already a bit dry then i also went to a psychologist recently i am a person with traits of the autism spectrum i also have a problem with small talk i very often write about myself i write mainly about my interests and i write really a lot i am also sensitive to every smallest change in contact hence my worry i wonder if it is simply my fault and if the problem lies in the fact that i write too much because i wrote so much before and yet we wrote all the time recently when we were writing she mentioned a male friend and said she writes with him literally about everything i don t know if she writes with him a lot or like with me when i confronted her about this she said she has depression and takes medication she also has spectrum traits this is why she replies to me like this i don t question that she likes me because we still play games and i m in her close friends on ig i know that my communication style is intense and monologue like however what is crucial for me: for a week i have been writing with another person from university and despite the same intense style i receive a lot of initiative back from her i feel engagement and we talk fluently this confirms my belief that the problem with my friend is something other than just me do you think she stopped liking me or is this just her avoiding a close relationship breadcrumbing should i withdraw from this friendship or fight for contact

burnt out and have to tell my boss about a schedule change i teach private lessons at a music school where i can technically make my own schedule but doing the scheduling is managed by the front desk staff and managers basically when i first got hired i took as many hours i could get because i needed the money i learned my lesson now that adding hours is way easier than taking them off then i got accepted into grad school so now i teach lessons 5 days a week and go to class on the 6th i m beyond burnt out after 1 5 years of having my schedule packed to the point where i m having a hard time taking care of myself my executing functioning used to be good but has gone out the window lately i was considering quitting altogether but in this economy i d dread finding a brand new job basically i have to tell my boss tomorrow that i d like to cut 8 hours off my schedule and i m super anxious about it i ve been thinking about it for weeks and i m not entirely sure what i m going to say or how much detail to go into i also feel guilty that it s creating more work for them to move students around i m giving them 1 month heads up but it s right before the holidays context: the boss front desk staff have a long history of scheduling over my breaks accidentally which has also made me dread having this conversation this is also not the first time i m requesting a schedule change before it was due to grad school courses here s my question: what would you say how would you approach the conversation have you ever had a similar discussion before and how did you get through it sorry this is long thanks for reading and for any advice

what is the strangest physical symptom you experience when you are anxious in terms of my personal experience with social anxiety one of the symptoms is a head tremor while i rarely experience it when i do it causes me immense anxiety and nervousness i also experience other uncomfortable physiological symptoms such as shaking in my hands and legs headaches dizziness blurred vision sweating palpitations a choking sensation and mental blocking these symptoms often surface in specific situations including: talking to strangers being in public giving a presentation in class or performing tasks while being observed or evaluated such as eating in public writing signing holding objects with my hands doing manual tasks performing and so on

i went to grocery store last week i know seems rather innocolous although many of you here know such simple task can be eventful and daunting for a person with social anxiety i usually avoid going to the store and just cook from the food my family brings home but that day i was determined to buy food myself my brain did what it always does and had me over analyzing and racking up awkward scenarios not knowing where to put my hands feeling awkward around a group of women likely my age walking by or if it s rude to stare at someone s general direction while i m waiting for them to finish checking out self checkout and if you re wondering it is rude so i turned around to mind my own business anyways aside from those moments something a bit interesting happened i always sort of struggle when it comes to hiding my feelings and this is true for social situations as well so i imagine i look a bit timid when letting the guard check my receipt anyways when i was putting away my basket it got stuck and i verbally muttered something to myself before picking my bags up and leaving because i felt so embarrassed i wasn t about to sit there and calmly make sure the basket would stack nicely after already feeling people were looking at me an older gentlemen who happened to be behind me was talking to the guard when this happened i heard him make a comment about how i must ve decided to let the workers do their job sort of implying i was being a bit stuck up you know like the people who leave food out in the isle or their carts in the parking lot this combined with the laughter i heard moments ago when my cart was stuck must ve internally made me a bit insecure so i just wanted to get out of there i noticed that guy who was previously behind me was almost by my side he is pushing the cart a bit slow i decide to walk a bit faster so i can get out because he has a cart and it doesn t make sense for two people to walk through together so i speed up and walk past him to which he says to me something like: don t play with me or it wasn t even that exactly but that was the sentiment but essentially maybe he thought i was being rude and trying to test him when i quickly walked past temporarily perhaps causing him to slow down and of course i keep walking without looking back to which he says yeah keep walking and chuckles to himself as i m writing this i feel a lot of emotions coming back i don t understand why men have to constantly think everything is some social heiarchy game where any man or fuck it let alone anyone inhabiting a male body is trying to test them i wasn t trying to i never asked for this body i didn t ask for this life i didn t ask for any of it maybe i should ve stacked the basket neatly but i was rushed a bit anxious there was no reason to make those comments after already laughing at me with the guard i m clearly some awkward person who s not a real threat to you i wasn t even looking at you so why say those comments to me i thought about that interaction alot on my drive home i thought about a lot of things and honestly wanted to cry when i did get home i was still thinking about so much about how social anxiety has left my life so ridden how debilitating it all is how if i were to do something horrible to myself it would be because of social anxiety social anxiety i had gotten from my parents and their abuse it s messed up just how much this has ruined my life how am i supposed to live independently and make a living let alone carve a life out for myself when such small events leave trauma on my mind when i can t even feel comfortable around groups of strangers regardless of their age i don t understand how everyone else gets past it i know i just have to take small steps and to push myself and maybe then my mind will start to not fear awkward or embarrassing experiences because they become mundane but this one hurt

things are getting worse social anxiety has gone beyond affecting my interactions with strangers it has started to enter my home and affect how i treat my family i always thought social anxiety was about strangers public places or presentations i didn t expect it to slowly creep into my everyday life even at home with my own family simple things started to feel heavy small talk at dinner answering a question just being in the same room nothing bad was actually happening but my body acted like something was wrong what helped wasn t forcing confidence or trying to act normal i realized that anxiety doesn t mean i don t care it just means my nervous system is overwhelmed so i stopped trying to perform socially at home i aimed for neutral instead some days that meant sitting quietly without explaining myself answering briefly but honestly staying in the room a little longer than usual then leaving without guilt no speeches no pressure to be interesting no pretending little by little my body stopped reacting like these moments were dangerous they didn t become amazing or easy they just started to feel safe if social anxiety is affecting even your closest relationships you re not broken it usually means your system needs gentleness not more pressure you don t have to fix everything at once sometimes progress is just staying a little longer exactly as you are

advice on what to say when landlord comes to inspect broken washing machine i have lived with the machine since i moved in 9 years ago not brand new then it s know stuck on servicing mode recently the drum looks like it s physically fallen or a belt maybe has broken it has been on a couple of very tacky slabs of wood from my previous landlord with it enclosed in my kitchen cabinets with no sideway access and little front area to bring out without risk of injury it is slightly tilted forwards with the front feet overhanging for quite some time i have decided with talking with friends and family it s completely fair wear and tear after all these years of no issues and a resonable lifespan of over 9 years for a machine if it came to it i shouldn t have to be paying or even splitting for a new one with a decent lifespan and ordinary use of this kind of appliance i would firmly insist i will just use the launderette quite happily instead with no demands and to in anyway burn bridges i have asperger s and struggle to come over completely decided and firm in what i say when on phone calls or confrontating with certain people like my landlord i just need some suggestions and advice on what i can say or suggest if it gets to a bit of disagreement between us when they come over later

i can t decide whether to try cognitive behavioral therapy i told my doctor i have anxiety he told me to try cbt and i completed a little anxiety severity test paper when i got home i checked out the website he linked me where the counsello will be from and i watched their introduction to anxiety videos it was just the basic talk of you re not alone think about positives instead of dwelling on your fears do deep breathing ask yourself if your anxious thoughts are rational journal your feelings how the hell is this supposed to help lessen anxiety i ve had my whole life i watched a mock cbt session on youtube and read a bit about this therapy but it just doesn t click with me at all or sound like it suits what i need i m not exactly sure what i need but my anxiety feels deep in my brain and severely affects my life when i told my doctor i was skeptical it d help me he responded that it s worth a try since it ll be free for me and it may be the push i need since i ll be working on my anxiety with another person i m still skeptical though that cbt is what s right for me and will help my anxiety caused insomnia and panic attacks and all what are your guys experience with therapy cbt

i m struggling so badly i ve always struggled with general and social anxiety i m 31 now and i totally thought i had everything reasonably in check the worst i ve felt social anxiety wise this year was when i interviewed for my current job back in june because it was a promotion and the pressure felt immense well now i have to give a presentation to a board as part of this job and it s making me feel like i m going to die i knew this was a thing when i got the job but i thought for some reason that i d be okay because i know the job and the department but i am not okay i am so not okay a gp has prescribed me short term propranolol and thats helping me not feel as sick and shaky but i still feel so so much dread and terror it s the presentation itself and also the unknown of what kind of questions might be asked the chair of the board is a scary man and i m terrified he ll be rude to me and then i ll stress cry in front of 15 of the most senior people in my organisation it has crossed my mind to go off sick this week because the physical and mental distress is insane but i feel so pathetic and i m worried about the repercussions from my workplace my manager can be really friendly but i m unsure if she d understand and it doesn t fix the problem of having to do this again next year as it s an annual review of my team i actually hate myself just now i hate that i m like this i hate that i have two more days of existing in this state before battling through the intense fear of the presentation before finally finally getting some relief i am so exhausted and overwhelmed and it feels like i ve been like this for weeks does anyone have any words of reassurance or advice or anything i want to disappear just pack up and go it feels like anything would be better than living in this heightened state of dread and stress

why do i randomly get social anxiety while other times i m good hi im 24m i was a very confident and happy person when i was a kid i still feel like i have that part of me but something messed me up i guess when i was a kid i moved to a different country and the culture shock was real i didn t feel it at the time but i found that the kids in my school had very different interests than me i lived in a pretty conservative culture before so when i moved and saw the kids were more free and did a lot of things like talking about girls and music all the time was something i didn t really know about don t get me wrong my life before wasn t closed off and everything was taboo or anything it just wasn t many of people s interests i was also like 10 at the time so either way i would still be new to listening to music and talking about girls regardless i had a little trouble making friends first especially close ones i was good in school and kids and teachers quickly noticed me and that boosted my confidence yet i still couldn t make close friends i now see that my personality isn t really a charismatic one and i don t talk alot that s part of it i think anyway throughout high school and even before i started experiencing some bullying but i always gave a tough view to everyone and challenged people and was able to stand my ground most of the time internally though i think that s how my social anxiety started i would go everyday thinking about how i would need to prove myself today and who would i need to fight off to get to the point nowadays i feel like i get a few days where i feel like myself and i can crack jokes and be social while the rest of the days i feel tired and anxious even if i wear the tough confident mask and i cannot function normally because of it i know that people who know me well know that i am kind of weird or that i can t hold a conversation but it s because that small window of socializing confidence is too small for them to get it feels overwhelming as i get bored alot of the time and i feel that family members whom i respect sometimes have this kind of disappointed look as they wanna see me excel and want to know me better but i have trouble expressing myself i feel like i have a chance to fix this but it s been years at this point and i am learning as i am growing but how long do i need to wait life is passing by me and i feel like i m missing out ps sorry for the very long post i just poured my heart out here

beta blockers has anyone ever tried them i have a potential confrontation at work coming up at work this week and haven t been able to eat or sleep properly in about 12 days all the therapy mindfulness distraction techniques in the world aren t helping and low blood sugar is kicking my ass the adrenaline is refusing to stop pumping i ve already lost a good few pounds and look exhausted medicated to all hell and still have those stomach knots i present as confident because i ve been stuck with this disease for a long time and have learned how to fake it however my body is suffering from the lack of food and sleep and i want to be kind to it also out of curiosity if anyone has taken them are doctors usually okay with prescribing them i hate a weird conversation with a medical professional what s really weird is that my mental state is fine i m a bit forgetful but nothing wild outside of just being stressed it s all physical might be a denial repression thing i can logic myself out of the spiralling thoughts but not the physical symptoms

growing up poor and carrying shame trying to finally let it go i grew up in a poor family and often had to work hard to help out our home furniture and yard were modest and sometimes we didn t have enough for food or clothes i hated that life and would go to bed wondering why me why is it like this i used to resent my mom for it though now i m proud of her it s hard for me to tell her that i love her and would give her anything if i could all of this made it impossible for me to feel relaxed or live normally even now i find myself envying people who grew up worse off but don t carry the same shame i want to finally overcome this leave the past behind and stop lying to myself i want to live without fear and do what i truly want has anyone else faced something similar how did you feel and what helped you move forward p s it took me a lot of courage to write this and share my feelings

have to drink just to attend class i can t attend class without first drinking a bit of alcohol my fear is too strong but the sad thing is even when i drink i still am too scared to attend class i ended up skipping classes as i figured that would be better for my health than to drink and go to class it s not every class i m scared of i can attend classes where i m not expected to talk but classes in which i m expected to talk i have an insanely strong fear it s not just class either i hadn t seen my brother in like a year my mom told me he was coming to visit with his family i was extremely nervous and had to go buy alcohol in preparation since i was expected to make small talk instead of staying in my room the whole time i had to drink just to work up the courage to speak to my brother for 30 minutes i don t even like alcohol in fact ever since i stopped attending classes i haven t had a sip of alcohol nor felt the need to i m not addicted to alcohol i just drink because it s the only state in which i can somewhat attend classes i ve avoided telling anyone about my anxiety because it s humiliating and my family would judge me i am expected to not be a little scaredy cat

i found something that helped my social anxiety around gaming i ve been dealing with social anxiety for years and one of the biggest things i avoid is voice chat in games like i genuinely love gaming but the second someone asks me to hop on discord i just freeze up and make some excuse about my mic being broken or whatever i know it s irrational but i can t help it my brain just goes into panic mode thinking about saying something stupid lately i ve been trying to push myself a little because honestly i m tired of playing everything solo feels really lonely sometimes tried joining a few discord servers but they re either dead silent which makes it worse or way too chaotic to start couple weeks ago i tried game nights with strangers but there s someone hosting it so they guide the conversation and i don t feel like i have to carry the convo i ve been going to these ludio sessions and i m starting to feel more confident me not trying to figure how to keep the conversation going reliefs me a bit i still get anxious before joining and sometimes when there is more people the hosts are really good at keeping things moving so there s no dead air even if i feel that what i just said is very dumb sometimes talking to strangers in a more controlled environment can help to get confidence

why am i like this my whole life i ve more or less been an outcast from elementary to high school i used to practically never speak at all to the point where people would wonder if i was mute especially early on i couldn t even speak when asked questions by teachers as i grew older i began to be able to speak in more formal scenarios but to this day even as an adult i find it impossible to hold a casual conversation or gain friendships my mind goes blank i give one word responses and the other party quickly realizes how utterly uninteresting i am barring my immediate family i have no one to confide in and in recent times i ve even grown distant from them and it s starting to dawn on me how i ve wasted some of the best years of my life friendless and alone that i ve missed out on so many experiences because of my inability to open up to others as a child i used to tell myself that i preferred being alone that i was happier that way in the end it deprived me of practically any social skills that i could have used to change myself life is a boring slog i have things to keep me entertained but at the end of the day i m left unsatisfied and unfulfilled and i can t help but wonder why me what went wrong in life for me to turn out this way i had good parents a good home life i ve never been diagnosed with autism or any other such disorder why was it so hard for me to speak from the very beginning my younger sister was born to the same parents was raised under the same circumstances and even as a child she was more confident and socially capable than i ve ever been it s like she lives in another world i saw her chatting up a complete stranger so casually that i d initially assumed they were friends or at least acquaintances and i can t help but feel a tinge of jealousy why couldn t i have turned out like that why have i been cursed with this miserable existence it s irrational of course and self centered to assume to that she doesn t to have struggles of her own and yet a part of me can t help but feel that way every time i try to reach out i end up stumbling over my own words or have nothing interesting to offer people are taken aback by my awkwardness and even a slightly confused look makes me feel ashamed and embarrassed i m so disconnected from normal society that it genuinely feels impossible for me change i m a young man in my twenties i have my whole life ahead of me and yet it feels so utterly hopeless

i went to the nightclub for the very first time at the age of 18 and actually had loads of fun this was a few weeks ago so i don t remember much the drinking age where i live is 16 btw so a lot of ppl already start partying at that age or younger anyways there was a party being advertised at various highschools in my area so i bought a ticket cuz clubbing is supposed to be fun and it would have been sort of an exposure therapy expecting some people from my class to also be there however the tickets sold out quickly so those who did say that they d be going ended up not and i was the only one from my class going to the party so i almost didn t go however i pulled myself together and went there anyways alone since i knew that there d still be people from my school whom i know and cuz i paid for the ticket and when i reached there i found a group of kids from my school with whom i talk rarely but who welcomed me anyway and i drank a bunch of alcohol in the waiting line which i guess is why my anxiety symptoms lessened and once inside i saw them dancing uninhibited on the dancefloor so i joined them and had the time of my life i had never been to a club before so this was all knew to me and i also kinda regret not ever having experienced such stuff earlier like a lot of people my age have done but i loved shouting the lyrics of the songs the dj played and jumping dancing along together with the other ppl from my school once i started getting ready to get home at 3am some girls from my school who were also getting ready to go home asked me some stuff i don t remember what exactly since they know me as the quiet kid but i was actually quite open that night and i told them that i have a social anxiety disorder and they actually showed a lot of sympathy towards me and didn t pity me which is something hate and yeah i then went home and that s basically it

does anyone else have the fear of interrupting someone and being perceived as rude usually in a group conversation it is really difficult for me to participate in group conversations for various reasons due to my social anxiety disorder but the main reason i feel like is because i m scared of being perceived as being rude due to accidentally interrupting someone does anyone have tips on dealing with this problem

lately a lot of people say to me don t worry things will get better i live outside of the us so some things i ll mention may vary from country to country i work as a medical doctor in a health care setup i m yet to clear exams and secure residency training i intend to pursue family medicine or clinical haem i hope i get there i work with nurses and doctors lately they ve been pointing out i look anxious and i need not worry this bothers me i feel angry at them and feel like shutting them down my country doesn t have a proper residency induction system and it has been difficult for me to clear exams i experience extreme anxiety that translates to brain fog around exam time even presenting ward rounds i m not coherent or say the most irrelevant things i ve been contemplating about my future will i ever be able to clear exams and pursue a career i want to recent months have been hopeless i wake up in extreme depression contemplating ending this all suffering i give myself reminders time and time again that things will get better i can t study anymore i feel like i m waiting for a spark this gives me hope waiting for a spark i ve worked on my communication skills over the months i ve learned to accept my challenges and journey and that everyone has their own challenges to face but i feel so hopeless and helpless that i haven t been able to clear exams whereas my peers are reaching one milestone after the other i m so exhausted and frustrated with everything the other day i was thinking of quitting my job hours later i m seeing and managing patients as if everything s okay with me

early teens it slowly got worse over time especially during the pandemic but its at its worse i went to a relatively small school so i knew everyone there since kindergarten so making friends wasn t i adapted a mindset of only speak when spoken to which ruined me further any conversation i have now is short and surface level and i don t know how to bring it further because of this conversations bring me a lot of anxiety and i try to avoid them always i know how bad this is and its killing me and i have no idea where to start i know therapy is a start but i have so much anxiety with therapists i don t know how i could do it i do have a psychiatrist and am on ssri and anti anxiety the ssri sorta helped me im able to go out in public and cosplay as a person lol and was even able to get a job which surprised me but all i ever really want is friends and a social circle or somebody to talk to and it feels impossible to get i have tinder and i get a decent amount of matches but i never start conversations and the conversations i do have are short lived the reason i don t start conversations is because you only have one shot at starting it and i don t wanna fuck it up with a feels like the life i want is just out of reach i know i should stop smoking carts and i did stop for work and surprise surprise my anxiety got a lot less worse but everything is so boring without it i feel like if i had something else going on my life i wouldn t smoke it as much but i have literally nothing going on so im just home bored in my room all the time i need to get out and stop but don felt so awkward at family gathering i feel like an alien among my own family it was so awkward coming into the hallway my family were the last ones to arrive i didn t know whether to hug or just smile and say hi so i went in for a hug with my uncle because my sister and mom hugged him as a greeting too and right as i went in for the hug my mom walked right in front of me it was _so_ awkward like i was super eager to hug him when really i just tried to act nice normal i am on a special diet so i brought my own snacks there were lots of snacks for everyone else and i didn t want to stick out but the anxiety was so bad i couldn t bring myself to plate my food or even take a bite out of it i ended up just pouring myself a glogg it s like a spiced christmas drink and to my disappointment it contained no alcohol i just wanted to numb the anxiety then when i sat down with my cousins i felt too awkward to ask about their lives or to speak about myself i always feel awkward for the reason i am 23 and still haven t finished highschool i felt so awkward anxious i wanted to cry i could feel the tears pushing in my throat and i avoided eye contact i was also worried cousins and others would notice how skinny i d become and judge me for it anxiety has made me skinny but it s not a severe weightloss it s just that i don t look completely healthy anymore even when i said something which was that i could bring some board games for the group my voice trembled though i m not sure people noticed when i finally had loosened up it was time to leave sometimes i wonder should i just have a small shot of vodka before events like these

flirting with robinhood and he responded with a gif of thumper excitedly thumping his foot one thing led to another and i invited him over to my house to cuddle me and get back tickles and just chill he actually came over but told me during the cuddling that he was so nervous on his way over that he considered asking me if i had any alcohol so he could have a shot to relax i asked why he was so nervous and he said he s got social anxiety i asked if he was still nervous and he said yes but we kept cuddling and running hands all over each other as he was leaving i told him i m off wednesday off he wants to do it again and we tentatively made a plan he said to call him the next day i realized i don t actually have his phone number so i sent him number if you want it and he didn t respond through anxiety sucks i m quite familiar with the old worry that i ve done or said something dumb and revisiting everything i said to people that day to make sure i didn t upset anybody anyway fighting those demons is tough and you kicked it s ass don t ever worry about bothering me either i ll probably bother you before you bother me now keep in mind all he would have seen on his notification was hey i just wanted to tell y but he didn t even open the message later in the day the next day i sent is it wednesday yet and shortly after that he opened and put heart reacts on both of those two messages but didn t say anything knowing he s socially anxious but not knowing to what degree i just figured he didn t know what to say to that so i let another day go by before saying happy friday i hope the rest of your week went well and he responded about his week being mostly good besides having a sick kid anyway i just wrote him hey there mr name we re halfway to wednesday i could definitely go for more cuddles with you and he opened it and didn t say anything does this sound like disinterested energy or does it sound like he s overwhelmed and not sure what to say am i being too much on the one hand i feel like it s mostly been back and forth and not clingy but on the other hand with somebody socially anxious is he thinking i m smothering him with my once a day messages is he just scared of saying the wrong thing and feels better in person talking over texting i m noticing i might just be pretty socially anxious myself

need dating advice as someone with social anxiety and facial sweating hi i m 24m from india and i have social anxiety and it often shows up as facial sweating especially on one on one conversations or even in groups even when i feel okay mentally the sweating starts and then makes me more anxious otherwise i m a working professional go to the gym the only place i can sweat my heart out and i m fairly normal once i get comfortable dating is where this really affects my confidence i keep worrying it makes me look nervous i d really appreciate some real world perspectives how much of a deal breaker is this in dating is it better to acknowledge it casually or just ignore it any advice from people with similar experiences or from those who ve dated someone with anxiety would be really helpful thanks tldr: op is 24m from india with social anxiety that causes facial sweating during conversations wondering how big of a deal this is in dating and whether it s better to acknowledge it or ignore it looking for honest advice and experiences

i often end up lying unintentionally because i panic or because my mouth moves faster than my thoughts can keep up i used to have really bad social anxiety but after years of effort it s gotten a lot better and i became really confident because honestly i m very proud of my progress but i noticed that i often end up lying unintentionally when i m talking to people mostly in a group setting i don t panic or get embarrassed or anxious when talking to someone 1 on 1 either because i panic or because my mouth moves faster than my thoughts it gets worse when i m drinking even if i m not drunk or tipsy i become more confident which basically means i talk faster and talk more i know i need to talk less but i ve spent most of my life hating being ignored or dismissed now my problem feels like the opposite of before maybe i feel too confident and i talk too much and while rambling is one thing i sometimes end up exaggerating or saying things that aren t true without meaning to often it s just small details but sometimes it s not so minor but it s never intentional and never something that matters i feel like a liar but correcting myself later is a lot weirder i don t know how to phrase things accurately or i blank out panic and mix things up at the moment i genuinely believe what i m saying is true but later i realize it wasn t i speak pretty fast by nature and slowing down is really hard but when i stick strictly to the facts everything i say feels unbearably boring i honestly don t know how to balance this

is my psychiatrist fuc ing me over hi everyone i m writing because i m really confused and i don t know if i m overreacting or if my concerns are actually valid i m 24 and for about 4 years i ve noticed a major drop in sexual desire and functioning i used to get aroused easily and sometimes i d even get anxious talking to someone because i liked them so much now it feels like i experience very little if any sexual attraction and in general my orgasms also feel much weaker at first i thought it was just stress and i ignored it but over time it started to weigh on me so i went through several appointments with different endocrinologists at one point they suspected a condition which i won t name for privacy but it was later ruled out after repeating tests multiple times my sexual hormone levels testosterone etc have generally been normal the last endocrinologist told me that in her opinion it made sense to rule out a major biological cause and recommended psychotherapy with a psychiatrist psychotherapist who s very well known in my city and is also a sexologist i was very reluctant i ve always been a controlled person calm i almost never get angry and overall i ve always managed my life without major issues so the idea of starting therapy felt very far from me but i agreed both because i didn t want to rule anything out and because when you re young and have sexual problems doctors often dismiss it as anxiety and that s it i wanted to be able to say i d explored that route too so i d be taken more seriously by doctors i started in september the treatment is very expensive and honestly it doesn t seem to be helping with the main issue sexually i haven t noticed any improvement in other areas maybe a little some self esteem improvement and for the first time in my life i m starting to feel the urge to come out to my parents i m also attracted to men and they don t know but after months regarding the problem that brought me there i see no results and i still think it might be more physical than psychological here s the main point in my last session i talked about two things: i ve always had difficulty with physical contact if someone hugs me i often tense up and pull away my friends know this talking through different situations we concluded i might have mild social anxiety i actually agree with that it s not disabling i have a normal life i go out i have friends i can talk to people and i ve lived on my own for 5 years but in certain contexts new environments new activities meeting new people i struggle more and i definitely have some anxiety issues what shocked me is that basically out of nowhere my psychiatrist suggested starting a medication: sertraline i was stunned it felt like a huge leap from mild social anxiety and a sexual issue that i still don t convincingly connect to psychology to prescribing me an ssri and to be clear she herself confirmed that i don t have mood disorders and up until now she hadn t even mentioned medication i tried to express my concerns but she insisted it was the right choice and wanted me to start literally the next day when i vaguely mentioned it to my parents without going into detail they got scared and had more or less the same concerns as me also online i read that sertraline is an ssri and that it s known for potentially worsening sexual functioning which really freaks me out since i m going there specifically for that problem of course i ll talk to her again but she seemed very determined and that made me lose trust i already had some doubts during the process but this really threw me off i m seriously thinking about stopping both because i m not seeing sexual improvements and because i don t feel comfortable with this prescription

considered gay at workplace hi guys just to give a little context i recently joined the new company and it is a sales job so many a times during training i had to give presentation infront of 40 50 people repeatedly for many days and i had a severe social anxiety where my voice gets very thin and i start to act awkwardly for examples use of hand gestures this gave the impression that i was gay also i would stay silent and don t talk most of my colluges except one guy whom i met first day of the training we have been having lunch together going on breaks this guy then start spreading rumour that i am gay i realised it very late when most of office now consider me as gay in my office everyone seems to indirectly make a fun of me although being gay is not problem but when you are straight it really hurts now i am thinking of quitting my job as it has really spread like anything and now i am being judged like anything at my work place i believe i should have never joined a sales job although i am good at what i do second mistake i did i shared some personal information with that person which kind of give him the authority to claim what ever he wants about me third mistake i didn t interact with most of my batch mates and he was getting along with everybody i just want to beat the shit out of him now onwards i would not share any personal information with any colleagues as they are not friends some can be snakes also edit: i forget to tell the other day i was at my desk working and my team was not present and out of nowhere a guy approached me and it shattered me like any thing now guys are showing intrest in me it is getting very toxic

how the hell does one navigate work organization type of parties parties in general are so difficult for me i had two parties in the past few weeks with an organization i m involved with i m not talking about a wild party at someone s house with booze and drugs everywhere i m talking about an adult social event type of thing the first one: i got to the place which was like an arcade thing with all kinds of games and entertainment and bowling i just stood against the wall and nobody talked to me i had to leave after 15 minutes despite everyone else bowling doing karaoke playing pool etc i don t know how to penetrate the little groups of 3 4 people talking in a circle what do i do just walk up and insert myself feels so awkward and my heart was pounding i went and sat in the car for an hour came back in spent another 15 minutes standing there talking to nobody and anxiety won i just left there was another event at a coffee shop again i had to force myself to go in i stood there and a few people talked to me but going around introducing myself just seems impossible this time i made it through the night because when i run away from situations i feel so much worse in the end but i truly don t understand how people get into these little chat groups circles it feels like the hardest thing in the world just ranting i guess

propranolol dosage i ve been trying to find a medication to help me with my major blushing issue the last couple months i ve been on a journey to find a medication that will help me with this i first started on propranolol 10 mg didn t notice any difference then propranolol 30 mg again didn t notice any difference then i tried clonidine hydroxyzine and most recently gabapentin the gabapentin has definitely improved my mood but doesn t do much for my social anxiety and blushing today i went to church and beforehand took 80 mg of propranolol i found that this helped me extremely i was able to hold conversations with numerous people after service and didn t feel any of the symptoms of social anxiety my question is is 80 mg an acceptable does that a doctor would prescribe my blood pressure is already elevated and how do i go about telling my doctor that i took a medication at a higher dose than what was prescribed and i d like to switch back to that medication and dosing the last time i met with my doctor he told me that the next step if gabapentin didn t work would be going on an ssri which i would like to avoid at all cost since i was already on one a couple years ago and it did nothing but turn me into a zombie

kicked out of a group activity before it even began i ve had the reddit app for so long now and never actually made an account so here i am now lol at the time of this happening i was 19 i am freshly 20 now this happened at the tail end of august i had this seasonal job as a prep cook and with the way the work stations were situated i was spending most if not all of my days with this particular coworker for the record he was really nice and somewhat of a friend mentor to me: this was my first kitchen job we both have adhd and he was incredibly awesome with helping me out whenever i didn t know what the hell i was doing i ve had pretty bad anxiety since i was a kid socially performance wise and am on meds for adhd it helps me a bit and this past year or two i ve been making an active effort to engage with the world around me a bit more outside of my many comfort zones this doesn t take away the fact that i still have very basic at times awkward social skills i talked to this coworker with the most ease because we had similar interests part of that being table top rpgs infact this is one of the first things he told me about: he was wanting to assemble a group to play his homebrew d d and start the campaign in january this was month 1 of that seasonal job i like ttrpgs mostly stick to solo one pagers and character creation and acting and everything but specifically i ve always wanted to play just remotely anything with a group he said he was gonna ask some more of my coworkers that looked nerdy i was one of the first people at that workplace that showed interest in his campaign told him i d love to join and he was cool with that i think a lot of us introverts anxious folks can agree that it takes a while for us to get out of our shell and show our true selves off i don t say this as way to soothe myself but the more i talked to this coworker everyday the more i could obviously feel myself get more comfortable i like to be silly and we matched eachother s stupid jokes and even that alone helped me gain a smidge more confidence when i interacted with others he kept bringing up his d d campaign always telling me who else he had managed to recruit and aside the nervousity i was excited to start most of these people i already knew too sometimes we d also talk about me doing art videos for the campaign once it d progress far enough anyways come the week before i get laid off we were talking about the campaign again he was talking on for a bit about the general structure and how it was gonna work and specifically was pretty excited about the fact he managed to recruit one of our admins somewhat close to my age and for the record she s really nice and generally enjoyable company to be around and has a literal acting degree from vancouver to boot and loves d d i don t know if that factors into anything right after that unprompted he tells me word for word you re not gonna be part of the group though not charismatic enough which right about killed me i feel some sort of distressed anxiousness recalling the memory now but back then i don t think i had much of an exterior reaction outside of a quick oh haha okay i still feel pretty down about it if anything i thought i was like being a lot better socially around him in specific like we had a lot of laughs together and often did silly voices character bits so i didn t really conversational skill differences between english and my maternal language i just really hate how out of the blue this came out not to get mopey but this happens so often i suck so bad with seeking oxytocin has anyone taken oxytocin for social anxiety once i heard the name i immediately assumed it was a dangerous drug because it s often related to heroin methanol and those bad ones but i checked and it is safe lol i ve heard of it before but didn t know what it s used for besides pregnancy anyways i looked it up because i have been resistant towards nearly every medication i ve tried for my social anxiety and depression and nothing has been effective enough for me yet i was bored and did some research and found that oxytocin in the nasal spray form is actually the most studied medication for social isolation and loneliness which i ve always had but i m reaching my peak and so depressed i got so excited when i read that because nothing else i ve looked into is known for that most meds i see can be effective for social anxiety but i have that loneliness and have socially isolated myself my whole life and literally have no friends lol so i thought this looked cool to potentially try to see if it helps has anyone tried it not surprised if no one hasn t it s almost never brought up when trying to actually find effective meds for severe social anxiety would love to know your experiences edit: i see many people confusing oxytocin with oxycodone very different drugs oxycodone is an addictive drug in the same family as heroin morphine fentanyl etc oxytocin is a natural hormone which is known for social bonding love trust etc

is it lexapro withdrawal or is this deadass just me hi yall i m a college kid 19f and i ve been outgoing my whole life i love parties getting to know new people and have been described by others as extroverted but i hang out around a lot of introverts and like all kinds of people don t care if interactions are awkward sometimes now for context: recently i ve been getting about 4 hours or less of sleep a night because i m an art student and it s finals week during this time i ve been away from my apartment so i keep forgetting to take my albeit low dose of lexapro up until yesterday it had been about six days anyway let s get to the meat now i went to a party last night with a few people i know somewhat well from class and had a great time no social anxiety issues but this morning when i was invited to my best friend s apartment for pancakes and pulp fiction i felt like i was being annoying the whole time every word that came out of my mouth felt stupid and like i didn t want to say it i was apologizing a shit ton and was constantly checking my friend s facial expressions for a sign that they wanted me to leave but they never told me to go and actually made me coffee i felt so weird i ve noticed that this has happened to me before where i ll get these random bouts of social anxiety like once every couple of months around people i know very well and have been comfortable around for years also the people i associate myself with aren t even judgy they re wholesome nerdy art kids that are all very smart and sweet and exactly who i want to be around anyways i m just wondering if anybody else has this same issue or if it s just me here s what i m thinking the potential reasons are: med withdrawal anxiety might be higher but i ve felt this even without med withdrawal fear of rejection with people that are close to me i care about them so i m more worried about irritating them because i don t want to lose the people i love hangover i ve heard if you re on lexapro alcohol worsens depression so probably worsens anxiety too adhd: i don t know if my adhd affects social interaction even in sporadic bits but i feel like a lot of weird shit is explained by my adhd so maybe that s why the end tl:dr i randomly felt a bout of social anxiety around one of my best friends for no reason today even though i am normally pretty outgoing looking for insight explanation

am i overreacting about being booed by my entire school hi i m a middle school teacher and i m trying to figure out if i m overreacting two weeks ago our avid teacher i ll call her ms cee emailed me and three other teachers about a fundraiser where students donate money into jars with teachers names and whoever raises the most gets pied in the face at a pep rally she asked if we were okay with it the next day i told her i did not want to participate i truly couldn t think of anything worse another teacher ms kay actually wanted to do it and offered to take my spot ms cee said they d keep my name on the jar and have ms kay get pied if i won but i clearly stated i did not want my name used at all and that students needed to be told ms kay was participating instead despite this my name stayed on the jar for two weeks announcements kept saying i was in the lead and students told me daily they were donating so they could see me get pied i kept telling them i wasn t participating i ended up winning for my grade since ms cee teaches 8th grade i emailed the 7th grade avid teacher ms s whose classes were the ones who nominated me again stating i had opted out she said it wasn t an issue yesterday morning i asked ms cee if i could stay in the bleachers since ms kay was getting pied she told me no saying the kids donated for you and that i needed to show face as a courtesy i was repeatedly told to do it for the kids and to step out of my comfort zone even after i explained i have severe social anxiety and being the center of attention is extremely distressing for me let alone being in a social setting such as a pep rally i am the type of person who likes to go unnoticed and i absolutely hate attention they thought it would be funny to call me down and just trick the kids and say that i elected to have a representative i was against this out of fear public humiliation at the pep rally ms cee called my name and had me stand in the center of the gym after the cheering stopped she announced i had opted out and that ms kay would be pied instead immediately the entire gym 1 300 students started booing and heckling me so loudly she couldn t speak over the mic for almost a minute i joked it off and walked away but internally i was devastated afterward students continued yelling at me calling me a scammer and a loser and one even flipped me off as i walked to my car other teachers later asked why i didn t just do it even after i explained i had set boundaries which i hate that i even have to do one teacher who is extremely outgoing had the nerve to tell me that experiencing something like that should ve cured my social anxiety i went home couldn t eat cried in the dark and i ve had intense anxiety and chest pain since this is my first year at this school and as a young second year teacher already dealing with high functioning depression this pushed me to my breaking point i already feel overwhelmed and unwanted and this made it worse i m also angry at ms cee she was someone i trusted and saw as a mentor and now i don t feel emotionally safe at my school i know pep rallies are meant to be fun and this probably wouldn t bother many people but being singled out pressured and publicly booed has been replaying in my head nonstop that was literally my worst fear come true i feel helpless defeated and deeply humiliated and i don t know how i m supposed to walk back into that building feeling okay tl dr: i m a middle school teacher with severe social anxiety who clearly opted out of a pie in the face pep rally fundraiser despite repeatedly setting boundaries my name stayed on the jar and i was forced to be called to center stage at the pep rally when it was announced that i opted out and another teacher would be pied instead 1 300 students booed and heckled me and the harassment continued afterward i felt publicly humiliated unsupported and betrayed by a mentor i trusted this pushed me to my breaking point and has left me anxious physically unwell and dreading returning to work edit: thank you all for the kind words wisdom and validation i wish i could reply to you all and thank you individually but i literally started crying again as i was reading these so i am taking a breather it truly means the world to me

is my childhood environment and upbringing caused me to be an introvert and alone hey everyone i m sharing this here because talking about it in real life usually leads to judgment or misunderstanding currently i find myself becoming very reserved preferring minimal interaction with people i ve become introverted short tempered emotionally drained and under constant career pressure i m trying to understand whether my upbringing and home environment played a role in shaping who i am today i come from a typical middle class indian household with very strict and controlling values small mistakes often turn into major issues even at 20 i need permission for basic things like stepping out briefly attending college events late night functions or social gatherings with friends is usually not allowed spending time outside studies is discouraged there is a strong expectation to focus only on academics and responsibilities once i m done studying i m expected to immediately help with household work leaving no space for rest or personal time privacy is almost non existent and even simple phone calls are questioned public criticism and embarrassment have been common often in front of relatives or others emotional well being is not given importance and discipline is seen as the only solution to every problem over time this made me stop expressing myself and stay silent to avoid conflict since childhood i ve been sincere with studies rarely asked for anything and avoided unnecessary expenses or demands by most standards i ve been a good child despite this i often feel controlled rather than supported my parents follow the same parenting style they experienced growing up and believe it s the only correct way my elder sibling does not support me either we ve never had a close or open relationship during conflicts instead of understanding my side the situation often worsens because of all this home feels mentally exhausting i often wish i could stay in a hostel or live away from home my biggest motivation right now is to secure a job in another state and become independent these experiences have affected my social and professional life i struggle with confidence making new friends maintaining eye contact and social interactions in general i ve never been in a relationship partly because i feel i have no control over my future decisions i ve developed anxiety in social situations and tend to stay silent most of the time as i learned that speaking up only creates problems i don t know how to stay calm happy or mentally balanced anymore i m considering living independently once i start working hoping it will bring peace and stability i m not posting this for sympathy or jokes i genuinely want to understand: can upbringing and home environment lead to these personality traits how do people cope heal and move forward from such experiences any respectful advice or shared experiences would really help thank you for reading

dating with social anxiety hi i m a 41 year old male i ve lived with social anxiety since my teens and because of that i ve never really dated around my early 30s i lost weight and started putting myself out into the world a little more nothing huge just small steps most of my time is still spent helping out at my parents jewellery shop where i mostly hang around and assist when needed recently i got a new puppy and started training her at the shopping centre where we ve just opened a new store that unexpectedly helped a lot she became a kind of buffer for me something to talk about and i found myself chatting to more people it gave me a bit of confidence and for the first time in a long while i felt like i d actually like to meet someone a couple of weeks ago i joined four dating apps unfortunately it s been a pretty discouraging experience i haven t had many matches and most people don t seem interested in talking i ve tried across multiple apps but the result has been the same i also live with body dysmorphia so i already have a very low opinion of my appearance the dating apps have sent me into a pretty brutal spiral because they felt like my only realistic way to meet people i don t really go anywhere it s basically the shop and home every day and i m not someone who can just walk up and talk to strangers so when the apps didn t work it left me feeling ugly defeated and honestly a bit embarrassed i haven t told anyone i live with how much this has affected me i wanted to do something on my own for once to be fair i have had a like or two even though i m 41 i look younger most people assume i m around 30 i don t say that in a vain way it s just something i m often told and sometimes it actually frustrates me i wonder if looking younger than my age works against me when it comes to dating i tried tinder but deleted it almost straight away it didn t feel like the right place for someone with social anxiety i d read that hinge was better but honestly it feels very similar to tinder maybe i m being too picky or unattractive i don t know but right now it just feels discouraging and hopeless

is it weird to have plushies that are married to each other if one belongs to a teacher or am i thinking too far into this literally woke up at 3am panicking about this for back story i am a junior in high school and have a teacher who has taught me since the beginning of high school she has one theater like class like a performance art and an academic class i am in both she s very nice and she s really artsy creative and likes weird kooky things along with that she really likes fugglers and labubus i have a labubu named jason who has kind of become an inside joke in the theater class for christmas i always get her a gift and other students do as well i got her a labubu because she s been wanting one for so long the whole class stood around to see which color she got purple and when she was holding the labubu and looking at them i held out mine and we jokingly made them kiss and i said aww they re married she said oh laughed and said i have a mini lafufu some one got me as well it s called a la baby and i was like aww that s their kid like a little labubu family and that was all the class laughed and no one said anything about it u til later when she referred to the labubu as a he and someone said wait how do they have a kid and someone else and i said immaculate labubu conception and the teacher laughed no one outwardly said it was weird but like i said i literally just woke up it s 3:30 am and i m really worried about this i m worried it s inappropriate and i m making people uncomfortable it s just silly plushies and i just thought it would be cute if there s a little plushy family but since one belongs to a teacher is that weird or inappropriate or should i just take my anxiety meds and go back to sleep thank you to whoever sees this

scared of voice calls honestly i don t think i have actual social anxiety so if this post doesn t fit here and gets removed could someone please redirect me to where i should post it i don t want to share this with anyone irl and i don t know where to talk about it online i 20f am scared about playing a video game with this guy i know from online we ve been talking for nearly 6 months we ve been sending lengthy messages to each other everything s been going well somewhere in september he proposed we could play a video game together over voice chat and i told him sure i kept postponing it until finally in early november we had a short 6 minute voice call for the first time i was extremely nervous i cried a little bit before the call but i pushed through it i had a feeling of i m gonna mess up and ruin everything sort of like a feeling of doom but it went fine his native language is english and mine isn t so that adds to the anxiety but i also just feel very nervous talking over the phone irl if i get a call from a random number or something my heart starts pounding etc i usually manage to act normal and everything tends to go fine if i pick up those calls or do things i m afraid of but i m still afraid each time especially because i like this guy and i am honestly very intimidated by him in his last message he said we should really play soon there s nothing to be nervous about i promise it s going to be fun and i feel so embarrassed i feel like he sees through me we both confessed we were nervous before the vc so it s not like this is new he knows i am nervous but the more i postpone it the more embarrassed i will feel and the harder it will be for me to finally do this with him i know the only solution is to keep pushing through these situations but i wish it was easier in the end it is my hesitant behavior that is going to ruin things not the fact that i d be a little awkward over a voice call i m tired of being such a big chicken and sabotaging myself
